description: IVISYS AB engages in the development and sale of machine vision inspection systems. The company is headquartered in Vallingby, Stockholm. The company went IPO on 2015-04-13. Its products comprise cameras, hardware and software, providing solutions for quality inspection, verification and gauging. Its offering comprises customizable solutions, such as IVISYS Pro Inspection Station, which can be equipped to conduct scan inspection, three-dimensional (3D) scanning and line scan inspection; and IVISYS Pro F, IVISYS Pro V and IVISYS Pro M, conducting predefined projects of object inspection for short-series manufacturers. Additionally, the Company provides services such as reporting, remote assistance, and 24/7 production backup over modem, among others.
naics: Navigational, Measuring, Electromedical, and Control Instruments Manufacturing
naicsNationalIndustry: Other Measuring and Controlling Device Manufacturing
name: Ivisys AB
